text: This article details the 2014 Durand Cup Quarter-Finals. The group stage features 12 teams: the 9 automatic qualifiers and the 3 winners of the preliminary stage. The teams are drawn into four groups of three, and play each once. The match days are between October 29 to November 4. The group winner will advance to the Semi-Finals. ==Group A== \---- \---- ==Group B== \---- \---- ==Group C== \---- \---- ==Group D== \---- \---- == References == == External links == * Official website Q
title: 2014 Durand Cup Quarter-Finals
